data_table.description: Dietary Intake Form, DTIC, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DTIC1
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Skim or low fat milk; 8 oz. glass. Q1 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC2
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Whole milk; 8 oz. glass. Q2 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC3
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Yogurt; 1 c. Q3 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC4
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Ice cream; 1/2 c. Q4 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC5
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cottage cheese or ricotta cheese; 1/2 c. Q5 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC6
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other cheeses, plain or as part of a dish; 1 slice or serving. Q6 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC7
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Margarine or a margarine/butter blend; pats added to food or bread. Q7 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC8
variable.description: [Dairy foods]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Butter; pats added to food or bread. Q8 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC9
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Fresh apples or pears; 1. Q9 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC10
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Oranges; 1. Q10 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC11
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Orange or grapefruit juice; small glass. Q11 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC12
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peaches, apricots or plums; 1 fresh or 1/2 c. canned or dried. Q12 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC13
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Bananas; 1. Q13 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC14
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other fruits; 1 fresh or 1/2 c. canned, including fruit cocktail. Q14 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC15
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... String beans or green beans; 1/2 c. Q15 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC16
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Broccoli; 1/2 c. Q16 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC17
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cabbage, cauliflower, Brussels sprouts; 1/2 c. Q17 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC18
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Carrots; 1 whole or 1/2 c. cooked. Q18 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC19
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Corn; 1 ear or 1/2 c. Q19 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC20
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Spinach, collards or other greens, but do not include lettuce; 1/2 c. Q20 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC21
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peas or lima beans; 1/2 c. fresh, frozen or canned. Q21 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC22
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark yellow, winter squash such as acorn, butternut; 1/2 c. Q22 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC23
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Sweet potatoes; 1/2 c. Q23 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC24
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beans or lentils, dried cooked, or canned, such as pinto, black eye, baked beans; 1/2 c. Q24 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC25
variable.description: [Fruits]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Tomatoes; 1, or tomato juice; 4 oz. Q25 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC26
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chicken or turkey, without skin. Q26 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC27
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chicken or turkey with skin. Q27 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC28
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Hamburgers; 1. Q28 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC29
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Hot dogs; 1. Q29 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC30
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Processed meats; sausage, salami, bologna, etc.; piece or slice. Q30 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC31
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Bacon; 2 slices. Q31 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC32
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beef, pork, or lamb as a sandwich or mixed dish, stew, casserole, lasagne, or in spaghetti sauce, etc. Q32 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC33
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Beef, pork, or lamb as a main dish, steak, roast, ham, etc. Q33 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC34
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Canned tuna fish; 3-4 oz. Q34 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC35
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark meat fish, such as salmon, mackerel, swordfish, sardines, bluefish; 3-5 oz. Q35 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC36
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Other fish such as cod, perch, catfish, etc.; 3-5 oz. Q36 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC37
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Shrimp, lobster, scallops as a main dish. Q37 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC38
variable.description: [Meats]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Eggs; 1. Q38 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC39
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Chocolate bars or pieces, such as Hershey's, Plain M&Ms, Snickers, Reeses; 1oz. Q39 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC40
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Candy without chocolate; 1 oz. Q40 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC41
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Pie, homemade from scratch; 1 slice. Q41 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC42
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Pie, ready-made or from a mix; 1 slice. Q42 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC43
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Donut; 1. Q43 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC44
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Biscuits or cornbread; 1. Q44 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC45
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Danish pastry, sweet roll, coffee cake, croissant; 1. Q45 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC46
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cake or brownie; 1 piece. Q46 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC47
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cookies; 1. Q47 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC48
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cold breakfast cereal; 1/2 c. Q48 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC49
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Cooked cereals such as oatmeal, grits, cream of wheat; 1/2 c. Q49 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC50
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... White bread; 1 slice. Q50 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC51
variable.description: [Sweets, baked goods, cereals]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Dark or whole grain bread; 1 slice. Q51 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC52
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Peanut butter; 1 tbsp. Q52 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC53
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Potato chips or corn chips; small bag or 1 oz. Q53 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC54
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... French fried potatoes; 1 serving, 4 oz. Q54 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC55
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Nuts; 1 oz. Q55 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC56
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Potatoes, mashed; 1 c. or baked; 1. Q56 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC57
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Rice; 1/2 c. Q57 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC58
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Spaghetti, noodles or other pasta; 1/2 c. Q58 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC59
variable.description: [Miscellaneous]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Home-fried food, such as any meats, poultry, fish, shrimp, eggs, vegetables, etc.; 1 serving. Q59 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC60
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Food fried away from home, such as any fish, chicken, chicken nuggets, etc. Q60 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC61
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Coffee, not decaffeinated; 1 c. Q61 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC62
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Tea, iced or hot, not including decaf or herbal tea; 1 cup. Q62 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC63
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Low calorie soft drinks, such as any diet Coke, diet Pepsi, diet 7-Up; 1 glass. Q63 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC64
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Regular soft drinks, such as Coke, Pepsi, 7-Up, ginger ale; 1 glass. Q64 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC65
variable.description: [Beverages]. In the past year, how often on average did you consume... Fruit-flavored punch or non-carbonated beverages, such as lemonade, Kool-Aid or Hawaiian Punch; not diet; 1 glass. Q65 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC66
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How often do you eat liver; 3-4 oz. serving? Q66 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC67
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Are there any other foods that you usually eat at least twice per week such as tortillas, prunes, or avocado? Do not include dry spices nor something that has been listed previously. Q67 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC68
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Food #1 eaten at least twice per week. Q68 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC68A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Food #1 name and usual portion size. Q68a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC69
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency for Food #1. Q69 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC70
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Food #2 eaten at least twice per week. Q70 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC70A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Food #2 name and usual portion size. Q70a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC71
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency for Food #2. Q71 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC72
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Food #3 eaten at least twice per week. Q72 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC72A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Food #3 name and usual portion size. Q72a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC73
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Frequency for Food #3. Q73 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC74
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What do you do with the visible fat on your meat? Q74 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC75
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What kind of fat do you usually use for frying and sauteing foods at home, excluding Pam-type spray? Q75 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC76
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Enter code and specify brand and form below. Q76 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC76A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand for frying. Q76a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC77
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What kind of fat do you usually use for baking? Q77 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC78
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Enter code and specify brand and form below. Q78 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC78A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand for baking. Q78a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC79A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What brand and form of margarine do you usually use at the table? Q79a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC79B
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Code for margarine. Q79b [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC79C
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand for margarine. Q79c [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC80
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. What kind of cold breakfast cereal do you most often use? Q80 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC80A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Brand of breakfast cereal. Q80a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC81
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Are you currently on a special diet? Q81 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC83A
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet weight loss. Q83a [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC83B
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet low salt. Q83b [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC83C
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet Low cholesterol. Q83c [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC83D
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet weight gain. Q83d [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC83E
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet diabetic. Q83e [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC83F
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. Type of diet other. Q83f [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC85
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. In cooking vegetables, how often do you add fat such as salt pork, butter, or margarine? Q85 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC86
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How often is salt or salt-containing seasoning such as garlic salt, onion salt, soy sauce, or Accent added to your food in cooking? Q86 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC88
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How often do you add catsup, hot sauce, soy or steak sauces to your food? Q88 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC89
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How often do you eat special low salt foods such as low salt chips, nuts, cheese, or salad dressing? Q89 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC82
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many years have you been on it? Q82 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC84
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many teaspoons of sugar do you add to your food daily? Include sugar added to coffee, tea, cereal, etc. Q84 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC87
variable.description: [Other dietary items]. How many shakes of salt do you add to your food at the table every day? Q87 [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTICFLAG
variable.description: DTICFLAG. 1 = if form is present [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTICCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: DTIC91D
variable.description: Day of data collection [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Dietary Intake Form (DTIC), exam 3]
